thread.title: William Steinhart

author: William Steinhart
title: William Steinhart
text: After a recent move I was unable to find my passport. Time was short so I resorted to the internet to find help. I chose Rush My Passport and from the very beginning I knew I had made the right choice. Merciline Ofelin took over my case. With her confident persona I began to relax. My passport arrived ahead of schedule and I am now a "happy camper." Thanks Rush My Passport and a special thanks to Merciline. Bill Steinhart
